resources.string: Your I-WATTS dashboard anywhere you go
Before you start, connect your I-WATTS device to begin monitoring power in real-time.
This may take a moment. Please keep the app open.
Based on current n-day consumption pattern
Ways to lower your power consumption.
Keep track of your electricity usage.
Take care of your I-WATTS hardware unit.
Make your I-WATTS device last longer.
Use appliances wisely to prevent power surges.
Upgrade your home for smarter energy use.
Understand your bill and spot unusual charges.
Spot trends and cut down on high-usage habits.
Go green with simple energy-saving habits.
Use power wisely during high-demand times.
Turn off lights when you leave a room.
Use LED bulbs — they use less electricity.
Unplug phone chargers when not in use.
Choose appliances that use less energy.
Open curtains in the day instead of using lights.
Set your air conditioner to a comfortable, not very cold, temperature.
Let clothes dry outside instead of using a dryer.
Cook with lids on pots to keep heat in.
Clean your air conditioner filters often.
Wipe your device with a soft cloth to remove dust and dirt.
Make sure nothing blocks air vents or fans.
Look for any cracks or frays in the cord.
Never place your device near water or in damp spots.
Place it somewhere it won’t get knocked over.
Defrost fridge/freezer parts when ice gets thick.
Don’t wait for them to get worse.
Check the manual for cleaning and care steps.

I-WATTS: An IoT-Based Smart Power Monitoring System was developed by a team of Bachelor of Science in Information Technology students from STI College Lipa. The project was created with the vision of helping households and communities gain better control over their electricity consumption through real-time monitoring, cost estimation, and smart alerts.
As developers, we share a commitment to using technology for practical solutions that address real problems faced by Filipino households—particularly the challenges of high electricity costs, lack of real-time usage awareness, and inefficient consumption management.
\n\n The Development Team
• Chareze M. Hirang
Applied technical expertise to build the system’s foundation, ensuring smooth integration between hardware, software, and cloud services.
• Nina Victoria C. Mercado
Contributed efficiency and organization, guiding the group through every stage of the research and development process.
• John Russel V. Reyes
Brought creativity and innovation to the project, ensuring that the system’s design and functionality were both practical and user-friendly.
• Joshua Edwin Bryan F. Zara
Focused on the hardware side of the project, assembling and testing the components to guarantee accurate and reliable performance.
Our Mission
To empower households with the tools to monitor, understand, and optimize their electricity usage, leading to cost savings, improved efficiency, and a more sustainable lifestyle.
Our Vision
To contribute to smarter, energy-conscious communities by innovating technological solutions that bridge the gap between electricity consumption and real-time awareness.
